summary: This is an email forwarding a sealed letter motion and affidavit from Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team to Judge Nathan, requesting modification of a protective order in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Filing of Sealed Motion to Modify Protective Order
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team files a letter motion, affidavit, and exhibits under seal, requesting modification of a protective order in her criminal case.

locations.context: The address of the law firm Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C.

keyFacts: On August 17, 2020, Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team filed a sealed motion requesting modification of a protective order in her criminal case.
The motion was filed by attorneys Jeffrey S. Pagliuca and Laura Menninger from the firm Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C.
The filing was transmitted via email by Nicole Simmons to Judge Nathan, who is presiding over the case.
The motion included an affidavit and ten exhibits, all filed under seal.
This document shows ongoing legal maneuvering and protective order issues in Maxwell's criminal case in August 2020.
